headline: How Recent Developments Are Shifting the Narrative for D.R. Horton Stock
summary: D.R. Horton’s fair value estimate has edged down slightly to about $164.69 per share, alongside a modest uptick in the discount rate to roughly 8.74%, as analysts balance a friendlier rate backdrop with softer demand expectations. Revenue growth assumptions have been revised lower to around 4.52%, reflecting concerns that housing activity may respond only gradually to rate cuts despite the company’s scale and execution strengths. Read on to see how you can stay on top of these shifting...
